pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, May 29, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

Room 225A
West Block
Parliament Hill

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

4:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Premier of Manitoba Brian Pallister.

Prime Ministerâ€™s Office
West Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 4:15 p.m.

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an armchair discussion with Liz Plank at the opening ceremony of the Open Government Partnership Global Summit.

Canada Hall
Shaw Centre
55 Colonel By Drive

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for Summit accredited media (for accreditation, please visit: ogpsummit.org)
  • Media are asked to present themselves to Room 204 no later than 5:00 p.m.
